description: Takes a list of configurationId as input and starts an asynchronous deletion task to remove the configurationItems. Returns a unique deletion task identifier.

parameters.name: configurationType
parameters.description: The type of configuration item to delete. Supported types are: SERVER.

parameters.name: configurationIds
parameters.description: The list of configuration IDs that will be deleted by the task. (string) ---

nested_items.name: taskId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier associated with the newly started deletion task.
